mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.*, C.COMMON_CODE_NAME AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME FROM T_HMCT_SHOWROOM_ITEM A, T_HMCT_PRODUCT B, T_HMCT_COMMON C WHERE A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO AND B.PRODUCT_CATEGORY = C.COMMON_CODE AND C.COMMON_TYPE = 'C'
SELECT A. *, B. * FROM ( T_HMCT_SHOWROOM_ITEM A, T_HMCT_PRODUCT B ) WHERE A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
